title: Dog eating its own vomit! Hadith about taking back your gift / gifts - Assim al hakeem
transcript: an authentic Hadith where the Prophet said we do not have the worst of examples or the bad examples a person who goes back in his gift is like a dog that vomits then eats back its vomit so the prophet Allah is giving us the example of a person who goes back in his gift of a dog that vomits and eats back its vomit which is repelling and and disgusting and this is why the prophet used this example as a salaam to stop you from even attempting to do something like this
